New Records: Zach LaVine has now dropped 30+ points in five consecutive games
Key Match Events: Chicago Bulls won 138-105 against the Washington Wizards
Post-Match Reflections: Lonzo Ball hyped up Zach LaVine saying he's probably the best shooting guard he's ever played with
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chicago Bulls have found their rhythm recently, winning five of their last seven games
Others: The Bulls are in a weird spot as they float around the middle of the Eastern Conference
